jp_name: ペコペコバッタ Peko Peko Batta
description:
The Peko Peko Grasshopper will jump into a person's nose to the point of where the target will eventually cry and beg for forgiveness. It may also cause them to be extremely repentful, wishing to forget their past sins and wrongs.
The Peko Peko Grasshopper may be distracted out by forcing the host person sneeze it out (generally with Black Pepper).

Apply it on a rock and then wipe it. After that, it will act like a dog and perform behaviors such as barking. Its diet is composed up of sand and water. The harder you wipe it onto a rock, the gentler the pet would be.

description: With the shoes, a person can enter the world inside a story book. But the user must not interfere with characters or objects inside the story or else the story will end up differently.

jp_name: ポップコーン ハット
description:
This gadget turns people's anger into heat energy to cook popcorn. When someone is angry, the user can use this hat and put it on whoever is angry. The person's anger will transfer to heat and the hat will pop out popcorn, also causing the person to calm down. Different people's anger makes different flavored popcorn which depends on how often their anger is or based on their own cooking skills such as Gian. Nobita, Suneo's popcorn tastes normal, Nobita's mother's popcorn is pretty spicy, Gian's popcorn tastes like his own stew and other things he cooked, which taste awful, and Kaminari's popcorn is arguably the best popcorn tasted.
But if the wearer is angered to the limit, their anger would build up and end up producing a lot a popcorn. But unfortunately, every piece would be burnt to a crisp.
Interestingly, a different flavor is made on every alternate use in the episode Anger Popcorn.
Shizuka is the only character whose flavour is unknown.

jp_name: 返事先取りポスト "Henji sakidori posuto"
description:
Write a letter to the person you want to address. You can write any type of letter such as a love letter. After that, put the letter you have written into this post box, You will immediately receive a reply to the person you sent the letter without having to be accepted by that person. 
Remember!. You have to write the compleate address you want to go to, and it must be accompanied by stamp, so that the letter can be received and immediately get recive a reply. Whether a letter is answered or not depends on the person you are writing to.
appears_in: How to Get a Reply to a Letter You Haven't Sent

jp_name: めんくいカメラMen kui kamera

The device is a camera decorated with roses and an eye. This camera likes beautiful, pretty and cute faces; but hates faces that are considered ugly or funny, which it removes from the developed photos.
This gadget also have a self-sense.
